hero.title: Building Scalable & Engaging Web & App Experiences With
hero.description_2: who loves building cool and scalable web & App experiences. From crafting beautiful frontends to powering robust backends, I bring ideas to life with clean code and great design. Let's create something amazing together!

about.title: Passionate about creating impactful web & app experiences
about.description: With over 5 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in building scalable webs & apps using modern technologies. My expertise includes React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, React Native, and Nest.js. I'm passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems and sharing knowledge with the developer community.

restaurant_system.title: Restaurant System
restaurant_system.description: A modern restaurant management system built with React.js and Nest.js using Shadcn UI. Designed for large-scale operations, it features multi-printer support, live order tracking, table management, and a sleek admin dashboard for streamlined restaurant workflows.

expense_system.description: A comprehensive expense management system built with React.js and Nest.js using Shadcn UI. It includes features for tracking expenses, generating reports, managing budgets, and user role management for efficient financial oversight.

carwash_system.description: A modern carwash management system built with React.js and Nest.js using Shadcn UI. Features booking management, service tracking, customer profiles, and comprehensive reporting tools.

experience.title: Professional Journey

bester_group.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
bester_group.description: Contributed to the full development lifecycle of enterprise web systems by building scalable APIs, designing reusable frontend components, and maintaining databases. Collaborated closely with senior engineers to improve performance and security across the stack.

ap_soft.title: Full Stack Developer
ap_soft.description: Led development on multi-tenant client platforms using modern full stack tools. Architected backend services with NestJS, developed dynamic interfaces in Next.js, and integrated real-time features and external APIs to deliver robust business solutions.

avana_soft.title: Backend Developer
avana_soft.description: Focused on designing and optimizing backend architecture for performance-critical applications. Built secure RESTful APIs, implemented data modeling best practices, and ensured reliable system integration with external services and databases.

kitn_company.title: Frontend Developer
kitn_company.description: Specialized in building responsive and user-friendly interfaces. Developed reusable components, optimized performance for modern web applications, and collaborated closely with designers to deliver seamless user experiences across devices.
